Name: Animal breed
Description: An animal breed is a group of domesticated animals that share a set of similar traits. Animal breeds are generally created by selective breeding, but also include groups that developed from feral stock.

Properties.Name: Breed of
Properties.Description: The type of animal this is a breed of (e.g. dog, cat, horse).

Properties.Name: Color
Properties.Description: The color or colors particular to, or commonly found in, this breed.

Properties.Name: Hypoallergenic
Properties.Description: "True" if this breed is considered to be more compatible with people who have allergies to animal dander than most. "False" if not.

Properties.Name: Light shedder
Properties.Description: "True" if this breed is a light shedder (for breeds of mammals only).

Properties.Name: Temperament
Properties.Description: The typical disposition or demeanor possessed by individuals of this breed.

Properties.Name: Place of origin
Properties.Description: The place in which this breed was first bred.
